1.0.0.name: wordpress/infinityfusionlite
1.0.0.description:
Revolutionise the way that you use Wordpress in your day-to-day life. It is sad how many 'premium' Wordpress themes completely disregard the admin user experience. As the long standing admin UI becomes 'stale', many secretly long for a dramatic redesign, and that redesighn has finally arrived. InfinityFusion is a fully responsive and retina display ready (and even higher!) set of admin themes to accompany your front end Wordpress theme, giving your users or clients a completely rounded and premium experience: This is a great way to impress all who view your work and make you and your website stand out from the crowd.

Features

  • Fully Responsive - Looks Beautiful on Desktop, Tablet and Smartphone
  • Multiple Preset Skins
  • Touch-Enabled
  • High Definition (Retina Ready)
  • Responsive HTML Image Backgrounds
  • Login Form Control
  • Advanced Configuration Panel with Import/Export</
